response.overview: After her husband dies, Li Meihua sends away her three young sons. Years later, two of them reunite as adults with sharply different lives: Zhiyong, a rigid road maintenance worker, and Weihao, a slick freeloader living off a wealthy patron. Their youngest brother, Tianyou, has vanished after years in foster care. A chance street incident brings Zhiyong and Weihao together, along with a new friend, Bao Zai. When Meihua invites them home and announces her marriage to a young feng shui master, James, the brothers suspect a scam and plot to expose himâ€”only to trigger chaotic, comic mishaps instead ensue.
response.title: Mama, Not Again!
